DynamoRIO
Additional Sample Tools

DynamoRIO provides a number of additional tools that do not each contain a separate front-end or extensive documentation. These samples are meant as starting points for building customized tools, but can also be used directly with the -c option to drrun. They are listed and described at Sample Tools.

  •   DynamoRIO version 9.0.1 --- Mon Feb 14 2022 19:02:57
